
About Me

I am a lecturer in physical oceanography at the University of Southamton, England. My research interests span small-scale ocean physics to large-scale dynamics of the overturning circulation. I use observations - from ships, satellites, seagliders and moorings - as well as numerical simulations to investigate the oceans. More ›
